name: 2024 5th International Conference on Electronics and Signal Processing
content: Publication: Submissions will be peer reviewed by both the conference scientific committees and journal editorial board. All registered and presented papers will be published in ICESP 2024 Conference Proceedings by Springer book series-Signals and Communication Technology, which will be submitted for \*Scopus\*, \*EI Compendex\*, \*SCImago,\* zbMATH, etc.
